about_the_game:
On a rainy night two days ago, a terrible car accident happened on a winding road.

The driver Dr. Lucrezia Borgia who was the senior researcher of Titan died on the spot as the car fell off the cliff and exploded. But the fellow Benjamin Engle disappeared with the important documents that Dr. Lucrezia carried. After investigating the scene of the accident, the police believed that the missing Benjamin was suspected of committing this crime and issued an order of arrest to all sectors of society.

In fact, Benjamin was also the victim of this accident. Since his injury was not very serious, he followed Dr. Lucrezia’s last words to take the important documents to the safe house prepared by Doctor in advance. When he turned on the only computer in the room, someone unexpectedly contacted him with an Internet call: The caller claimed to be an AI created by Doctor, and said that the car accident was not an accident actually…

After hanging up the calling, Benjamin temporarily forgot the physical and mental suffering and the grief of losing his closest person, and began to investigate the truth of Dr. Lucrezia’s death. However, Benjamin did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

More Information:
  • A New Chapter - Hello World in DLC
  • New UI Design
  • New Database Design
  • New Challenging Puzzle-Features

Thank you so much for your support to Cyber Manhunt. We will keep doing our best to my game.
detailed_description:

⚠️ Strongly recommend playing the basic content and tutorial first to get better experience. ⚠️

Get the BEST PRICE to purchase Cyber Manhunt + DLC from this BUNDLE. You will get additional 10% OFF to purchase DLC only from the Bundle if you already own Cyber Manhunt.

Note : Please update the game to play DLC!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cyber Manhunt - Hello World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 610
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 630
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death with the important documents. Just when Benjamin began to investigate the truth of the death, he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
